CHIN 101.description: Beginning Mandarin Chinese. Class practice and assigned outside work in pronunciation, sentence structure, reading, writing and introduction to Chinese culture. 3 lectures, 1 activity.
CHIN 101.title: Elementary Mandarin Chinese I

CHIN 102.description: Class practice and assigned outside work in pronunciation, sentence structure, reading, writing and introduction to Chinese culture.  To be taken in numerical sequence.  3 lectures, 1 activity.
CHIN 102.title: Elementary Mandarin Chinese II

CHIN 103.description: Class practice and assigned outside work in pronunciation, sentence structure, reading, writing and introduction to Chinese culture.  To be taken in numerical sequence.  3 lectures, 1 activity.
CHIN 103.title: Elementary Mandarin Chinese III

CHIN 201.description: Development of presentational, interpersonal, and interpretive intermediate-level language skills in Mandarin Chinese within an intercultural context.  To be taken in numerical sequence.  3 lectures, 1 activity.  Fulfills GE C5.
CHIN 201.title: Intermediate Mandarin Chinese I

CHIN 202.description: Development of presentational, interpersonal, and interpretive intermediate-level language skills in Mandarin Chinese within an intercultural context.  To be taken in numerical sequence.  3 lectures, 1 activity.  Fulfills GE C5.
CHIN 202.title: Intermediate Mandarin Chinese II

CHIN 203.description: Development of presentational, interpersonal, and interpretive intermediate-level language skills in Mandarin Chinese within an intercultural context.  To be taken in numerical sequence.  3 lectures, 1 activity.  Fulfills GE C5.
CHIN 203.title: Intermediate Mandarin Chinese III
